name: post-grants
description: Requests the payout of the selected grant offer.

grantAccountId.description: The identifier of the grant account used for the grant.

grantOfferId.description: The identifier of the grant offer that has been selected and from which the grant details will be used.

accountHolderId.description: The identifier of the receiving account holder. The payout will default to the primary balance account of this account holder if no `balanceAccountId` is provided.

balanceAccountId.description: The identifier of the balance account that belongs to the receiving account holder.

transferInstrumentId.description: The identifier of the transfer instrument that belongs to the legal entity of the account holder.

$ul: **amount**
**currency**: The three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**value**: The amount of the transaction, in [minor units](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).
**balances**
**currency**: The three-character [ISO currency code](https://docs.adyen.com/development-resources/currency-codes).

**total**: Total amount. A sum of principal amount and fee amount.
**counterparty**
